personal.name: Pratik Kumar Kale
personal.title: AI Solutions Engineer | Strategy - Data & Analytics
personal.description: I collaborate, coach, and guide teams across the org to ship AI‑driven analytics — reliable platforms, governed data, fast insights.

about.intro: Org‑wide data & analytics — I collaborate, coach, and guide teams with practical guardrails, measurable outcomes, and hands‑on delivery.
about.story: I partner across product, data, and analytics teams to design and ship ingestion → models → semantic layers, with selective LLM/RAG. I translate goals into platform choices and operating standards, and contribute where impact is highest.
about.approach: Balanced leadership, org‑wide: align on outcomes; co‑create light standards (data contracts, metrics layer, cost/perf guardrails); build refs; pair and review; coach; document the essentials; hand off cleanly. Cloud: OCI, AWS, Azure.

services.title: Business Intelligence Development
services.description: Designing and delivering interactive dashboards and semantic models using Power BI, Tableau, and OAC to provide actionable insights.

services.title: Data Strategy & Architecture
services.description: Crafting scalable BI and analytics solutions with robust data models, governance, and integration with cloud ecosystems.

services.title: Cloud Data Solutions
services.description: Leveraging AWS, Azure, and OCI for data warehousing, integration, and analytics to drive digital transformation.

services.title: Mentoring & Enablement
services.description: Guiding teams and individuals in SQL, BI SDLC, data storytelling, and analytics best practices to build organizational capability.

portfolio.title: Enterprise BI Modernization
portfolio.description: Migrated Datalake from AWS Cloudera to Oracle ADW, integrating with Power BI and ensuring data accuracy through extensive SQL validation.

portfolio.title: Performance Optimization Initiative
portfolio.description: Optimized Power BI datasets and report load times by adopting native connectors and fine-tuning refresh processes, improving efficiency significantly.

portfolio.title: Cross-Team Enablement Program
portfolio.description: Led training sessions on BI storytelling, SQL, and analytics best practices, upskilling junior engineers and improving team productivity.

contact.message: Looking to transform your business data into decisions? Let's connect and explore how I can help bring your analytics vision to life.

footer.tagline: Turning data into decisions, one insight at a time.
